summary: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.
cast: Kate Ashfield|Geoffrey Breton|Ron Cook|Nicholas Farrell|Iain Glen|Tamsin Greig|Felicity Jones|Ellie Kendrick|Lesley Sharp|Tim Dantay|Roger Frost|Mariah Gale|Robert Morgan|Greg Bennett
director: Stars: Kate Ashfield, Geoffrey Breton, Ron Cook | See full cast & crew »
title: El diario de Ana Frank
